project.elearnt

Class Scenes

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • project.elearnt.Scenes

  • public class Scenes
extends Activity
    This class responsible for create new scenes or correct the before scenes creates between the options figures modify, delete and correct link scenes name
    Version:
    1.0 January 18, 2014
    Author:
    Jose Ignacio Madan Frias

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void correctLinkScenes(int requestCode)
      Correct the exits from exits list, for this throw new activity (CorrectLinkScene)
      boolean existsScenesName()
      Search if exists scenes in the project
      java.lang.String getDefaultName()
      Obtain default name scene
      void getImage(java.lang.String sceneName)
      Get image from gallery or take a picture depend of the option select
      void onBackPressed()
      Override onBackPressed to prohibit it use, except when all links are corrects
      void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Create the basic configuration on the screen, with three buttons for finish, do action and search before scenes create, edit text to put name of the scene, radio group to select between get from gallery or pick a photo, and for last, a spinner with options like get, modify, delete and corrects link scenes name
      void resetRadioButtons()
      Clear radio button group
      void setVisibility()
      This method change the visibility of the screen components, like radioGroup, textView, button and editText depend on the option select in the spinner (obtain, modify, delete or correct link scenes)
      void startNewActivity()
      Than itself name indicated, throw new activity The activity throw is Exits and put in the bundle path_dir, name and idScene

      Than itself name indicated, throw new activity

        public void correctLinkScenes(int requestCode)
        Correct the exits from exits list, for this throw new activity (CorrectLinkScene)
        Parameters:

      • existsScenesName

        public boolean existsScenesName()
        Search if exists scenes in the project
        Returns:
        true if exists at least one scene in the project

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility()
        This method change the visibility of the screen components, like radioGroup, textView, button and editText depend on the option select in the spinner (obtain, modify, delete or correct link scenes)

      • getDefaultName

        public java.lang.String getDefaultName()
        Obtain default name scene
        Returns:
        name of the scene by default (1..N)

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Create the basic configuration on the screen, with three buttons for finish, do action and search before scenes create, edit text to put name of the scene, radio group to select between get from gallery or pick a photo, and for last, a spinner with options like get, modify, delete and corrects link scenes name
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - for save values of the activity

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Override onBackPressed to prohibit it use, except when all links are corrects
